original:
She is right, my honey really managed to rescue that scientist's daughter. Strange child, immune to That City's bioweapons, as she stated herself. That's what her father told her when injecting her with all kinds of shit. Her bruises were healing up at an extreme rate. The whole shit was really a conspiracy with shady people involved. This is what government told me later on. Hunter brute, horribly mutated scientist, stolen samples of bioweapons, shady female spy. That spy really did save my life multiple times, helping me to destroy this brute, but she clearly had her own motives there. Every time our paths crossed, I always knew that she had some errands to do, provided by her new employers. Whatever, we made it safe, now about events after That City essentially.
 
    Let's just say that government has become interested in two barely trained survivors going through so much shit successfully. We've been 'offered' government agents jobs. Not much choice, considering what we've seen. Then these were times of my duty in various parts of the World. Strangely, current New England prominent factions of madmen that are obsessed with BL9 symbiote really remind me of what I've seen in Europe. Is that some kind of a bullshit trend? As years went by, I tried to convince my engineer girl to let me talk government out of her further involvement. I've been seeing more and more shit that I didn't get killed for only because I'm too useful to kill essentially.
 
    Honey is too stubborn, she wanted to delve even deeper into this. Saving people from madmen with bioweapons is more important than building complex electromechanical systems. That's what she says. When Cataclysm happened, this tight grip was gone. So now we hunt for remnants of these madmen, whereas her brother with his partner try to rebuild everything in local areas. It's a fucking mess, but at least we've got each other to survive hopefully as well
translation:
她是正确的，我的宝贝确实设法救出了那位科学家的女儿。奇怪的孩子，她自己说对那个城市的生物武器免疫。这是她父亲在给她注射各种乱七八糟的东西时告诉她的。她的伤痕以惊人的速度愈合。整件事情是个阴谋，牵涉到一些见不得光的人物。政府后来就是这样告诉我的。凶猛的猎人，变异得可怕的科学家，被盗的生物武器样本，神秘莫测的女间谍。那名间谍确实多次救了我的命，帮助我摧毁了那个怪物，但她显然有自己的目的。每次我们相遇，我都知道她总有任务要做，是她的新雇主指派的。不管怎样，我们安全脱身了，现在来说说那个城市之后的事情。
 


可以说，政府对我们这两个几乎未经训练却能成功度过重重难关的幸存者产生了兴趣。我们被“提供”了政府特工的工作。考虑到我们所目睹的一切，我们并没有太多选择。随后，我在世界各地履行职责。奇怪的是，如今新英格兰地区那些痴迷于BL9共生体的疯狂派系，让我想起了在欧洲见到的情景。这是一种荒谬的趋势吗？随着时间的推移，我试图说服我的工程师女友，让我去说服政府让她不要再参与这些事。我越来越多地看到一些我之所以没有被杀死，仅仅是因为我还太有用的情况。
 


亲爱的太固执了，她想更深入地探究这一切。她说，从拥有生物武器的疯子手中救人比构建复杂的机电系统更重要。当大灾变发生时，这种束缚消失了。现在，我们在追捕那些疯狂分子的残余，而她的哥哥和他的伴侣则在当地努力重建一切。这是一团糟，但至少我们有彼此，希望能一起生存下去。

original:
She managed to finish them off, taking strange samples from their bodies so that our researchers could properly analyze these and figure out whether it was the already typical for many of us blob infusal or something else.
 
    The sample turned out to be a strange blob-like organism, but it was unlike blob...the resemblance to blob is only due to the way it is capable of shaping itself and rapidly mutating, but this one is like a parasitic living organism, it is capable of evolving into strange fleshy amalgamations, tentacles, worm and spider-like bodies emerging from different sides of the carrier, heavily mutilating the body of the carrier in some cases and lightly in other.
 
    Wondering how we've managed to figure this out?We had to destroy that sample even because it was somehow alive and tried to attack our scientists, so all of this knowledge does not stem from that at all...
Silat
translation: 班卡苏拉刀术

original: So far I've managed to receive enough intel to determine what else our crazy castlelan has got up his sleeve. Below you there is an old dungeon that seems to be infested with these Crawlers and God knows what else, upon reaching the end of it you'll descend into the Castle's sewer system...
translation: 到目前为止，我已经收集到足够的信息来判断我们那位疯狂城主还有什么阴谋诡计。在你下方有一个旧地牢，似乎到处都是这些爬行者，以及天知道还有什么其他东西。一旦到达地牢尽头，你将深入城堡的下水道系统……

original: So first of all, to help you with your endeavors, there is a strange trading merchant or an item collector of some sorts here around The Castle, the zealots are not hostile towards him for some reason. He claims to be selling `BL9-infused goods` in exchange for the gold coins from the zealots. I am not sure, but the quality of these seemed good to me upon first glance, but my job here is being a spy and not really going all-guns blazing unless I'm spotted...
translation: So first of all, to help you with your endeavors, there is a strange trading merchant or an item collector of some sorts here around The Castle, the zealots are not hostile towards him for some reason. He claims to be selling `BL9-infused goods` in exchange for the gold coins from the zealots. I am not sure, but the quality of these seemed good to me upon first glance, but my job here is being a spy and not really going all-guns blazing unless I'm spotted...

original:
So now I believe that you can guess `THEIR` plan - to create an army of perfectly obedient bio-soldiers to eradicate anyone that stands on their way and conquer these lands and try to take on the other regions, maybe even The Whole World 
 
     They MUST be stopped! They are posing a threat to our and other remaining altruistic organizations. We do our best to help survivors, counter The Blob, establish SOME form of civilization, basic at least, spread our influence without spilling blood or turning everyone into controlled puppets...
translation:
因此，我相信你现在能猜到**他们的**计划——培育一支绝对服从的生物战士军队，消灭所有挡在他们路上的人，征服这片土地，并试图侵占其他区域，甚至可能是整个世界。他们**必须**被阻止！他们对我们的组织以及其他留存的利他组织构成了威胁。

我们竭尽全力帮助幸存者，对抗**腐化之潮**，建立某种形式的文明，哪怕是基础的，扩大我们的影响力，同时不以流血或把每个人都变成受控傀儡为代价...

We do our best to help survivors, counter The Blob, establish SOME form of civilization, basic at least, grow in power without spilling blood of innocents or turning everyone into controlled puppets...

original: So there are more secret structures where BL9 can be found?My God, is this really that widespread?'EE' time - Exploration and Eradication it seems then...

So you've already heard of `IT`? `IT` - that's a grotesque amalgamation of different creatures including a human spliced up together forming a very dangerous and a deadly mutant. I believe that `IT` will be waiting for you somewhere along your way, be aware of this and use this knowledge to not be caught off guard!
translation: 所以你已经听说过“它”了？“它”是一个可怕的混合体，由不同生物包括人类拼接而成，形成了一个极度危险且致命的变异体。我相信“它”会在你前进的某个地方等着你，要对此有所警觉，并利用这些信息以防措手不及！

original: So, you've interrupted our great ceremony and starting to massacre my people. How rude and antagonistic of you, little moth, you seem to lack manners. I guess my humble and welcoming servants do not really fit your criteria, eh? A company of stinky flies for you, little moth - that is what you are definitely going to appreciate!
translation: 那么，你打断了我们的伟大仪式，开始屠杀我的族人。多么粗鲁和充满敌意啊，小蛾子，你似乎缺乏教养。我想我那些卑微而热情的仆人们并不符合你的标准，对吧？为你准备一群臭苍蝇，小蛾子——这肯定是你会欣赏的！

original: Stranger, I sell BL9-infused weapons, armor, resources, BL9-infused robots, healing sprays which are of a VERY high quality! These all use benevolent version of BL9 so it's not that weaponized vile thing these factions use. BL9-infused robots are your air, ground allies, which can smash, attack from range, stun your enemies. You craft ammo, various melee weapons as well, according to 'BL9' recipes in your PDA or Notebook or whatever. Initial types of ammo, melee weapons have no fabrication, mechanics skill requirements, but further have requirements of level 5 of each along with level 8 of each for even stronger ammo along with melee weapons. You use BL9 samples resources to do that, which can be found as loot from enemies, which I also sell. It's true, stranger, there is gear so rare in some places that even I would not sell it to anyone! I will tell you about it if you ask me where these places are, maybe I have some copies of maps, stranger

original: System is online. Initiate conversation mode. Look at that. Survivor has managed to activate a hologram projector easily! Yeah, my creators know many types of you who don't even read what's written on items honestly. Good that you seem like a pretty intelligent person hopefully. So, do you want me to show you where this location is via my network system? I can grant you access to archived global network system which my creators have managed to restore. However, after usage I will need to recharge a little bit which only means that you will need to wait to use this function again hopefully
translation: 系统在线。启动对话模式。看看这个。幸存者竟然轻松激活了一个全息投影仪！是的，我的创造者知道很多像你这样连物品上的说明都不读的人。幸好你看起来像是一个相当聪明的人。那么，你想让我通过网络系统向你展示这个位置在哪里吗？我可以授权你访问我的创造者恢复的存档全球网络系统。然而，使用后我需要稍微充一下电，这意味着你将需要等待才能再次使用这个功能，希望你能理解。

original: Tall augmented human host of the BL9, they call it 'The Clawer' due to it being armed with razor sharp mechanical claws that it's capable of activating at will, in order to constrain indiscriminate killing power, it's eyelids were stitched together, though it's loss of sight led to increased hearing making them formidable opponents even when blind
translation: BL9是一种体型高大的人类宿主，他们称它为“爪子”，因为它装备了锋利的机械爪子，可以随意激活，为了限制滥杀滥伤的能力，它的眼睑被缝合在一起，虽然它的视力下降导致听力增强，这使得它们即使失明也成为令人生畏的对手

original: Tall augmented human host of the BL9, they call it 'The Clawer' due to it being armed with razor sharp mechanical claws that it's capable of activating at will, in order to constrain indiscriminate killing power, it's eyelids were stitched together, though, BL9 has still managed to retain some of their sight making them not fully blind
translation: Tall augmented human host of the BL9, they call it 'The Clawer' due to it being armed with razor sharp mechanical claws that it's capable of activating at will, in order to constrain indiscriminate killing power, it's eyelids were stitched together, though, BL9 has still managed to retain some of their sight making them not fully blind

original:
That's so kind of you to ask, stranger! I have had a lot of adventures during my time in Spain which is a wonderful country with a great language, but there were some creepy things there! Creepy zombified villagers in gloomy villages, cannibalistic cultists in a true madman's castle, heavily armed militia on an island of a terrorist mutant! Castle along with Island that these conquerors mooks built here are merely imitations. I met some great people there too! Espagnol scientist, buffed up American looking mercenary, agile American looking agent even. Scientist got killed after he tried to atone for his unethical experiments because he was doing work for these terrorists. Buffed up soldier was an arrogant wanker, who, as I have later learned, did work for these terrorists too, he was killed when he tried to kill that agile American agent.
 
    Now, stranger, American agent was a very fine, sleek man, a dream of women, a dream of some men too! Like in that song, this story would have been nothing if there had not been a woman or a girl! There were two fine women, but I found one more pleasant to be around than other. American looking president's daughter, who was kidnapped, along with an American Asian spy of some sorts.
translation:
That's so kind of you to ask, stranger! I have had a lot of adventures during my time in Spain which is a wonderful country with a great language, but there were some creepy things there! Creepy zombified villagers in gloomy villages, cannibalistic cultists in a true madman's castle, heavily armed militia on an island of a terrorist mutant! Castle along with Island that these conquerors mooks built here are merely imitations. I met some great people there too! Espagnol scientist, buffed up American looking mercenary, agile American looking agent even. Scientist got killed after he tried to atone for his unethical experiments because he was doing work for these terrorists. Buffed up soldier was an arrogant wanker, who, as I have later learned, did work for these terrorists too, he was killed when he tried to kill that agile American agent.
 
    Now, stranger, American agent was a very fine, sleek man, a dream of women, a dream of some men too! Like in that song, this story would have been nothing if there had not been a woman or a girl! There were two fine women, but I found one more pleasant to be around than other. American looking president's daughter, who was kidnapped, along with an American Asian spy of some sorts.

original: The next rooms are hidden laboratories where `THEY` conduct their vile and inhumane experiments. I've seen the bioweapons that are kept there and I've been horrified - these are the most dangerous scums you've seen yet. Incredibly tall flesh eating constantly regenerating abominations, it will take many clips to gun these scums down, be careful!
translation: 接下来的房间隐藏着那些“它们”进行卑鄙和非人道实验的秘密实验室。我亲眼见过那里存放的生物武器，那种恐惧难以言表——这些是你迄今为止遇到的最危险的渣滓。它们是异常高大、不断啃食血肉并能持续再生的可憎之物，要击倒这些渣滓，你需要倾泻无数弹夹，务必小心！

original:
The organization that has been making attempts in gaining control over the Blob and the Nether technologies has gotten into contact with the The Castlelan to our great surprise, The Castlelan gave away some of the samples to them due to all the trouble that it brought to him turning his servants and guards into zombie-like creatures, obviously in exchange for organization's protection, constant supply of resources and one more horrible thing...
 
    The samples were quickly delivered to this their base of operation, in mere weeks they have managed to understand the deadly and powerful potential of that organism that they have managed to acquire, the fundamental knowledge that they've gained is that the ones who were infected with the ordinary samples turned into mindless aggressive felsh-eating beings, but considering the resemblance with The Blob, there IS a possibility of controlling these beings and turning them into minions.
 
    Altering the DNA and forcing mutations of the samples that they've received they finally managed to create a special type of this organism that they've named BL9 that is capable of controlling the beings who were infused with the ordinary types, still retaining their intelligence, now their terrible dream came true - they have created a pretty much fully controllable biological weapon...

The process of infusion has been completed successfully! Now I possess the power that I devoted myself ENTIRELY to, to make it as close to extraterrestrial as possible! Niw that I can feel it - I realize how much I underestimated it! You will feel it too - you will be forcefully infused with it, either with or without your destruction, NO ESCAPE NOW!
translation: 灌输仪式圆满达成！此刻，我掌握了那股倾尽全力、竭力粹炼的异星之力！感受其威能之时，方觉往昔对其威力的低估何其之深！尔等亦将感同身受——无论自愿与否，无论存亡之际，这股力量都将强行融入你的血脉，逃脱？绝无可能！
context:

translation: 本mod中的射程武器使用多种原版弹药类型（手枪--9mm，.45等，霰弹枪--猎鹿弹，20x66mm等--懂得都懂）以及特殊的BL9弹药（猎鹿弹 BL9弹/猎鹿弹 BL9弹 MKii，.308 BL9弹/.308 BL9弹 MK ii等），这些弹药只能使用通用的BL9材料制作，这些通用的材料一般从BL9系列敌人身上掉落，也可以用变形怪糊制作。

BL9 samples drop from BL9 enemies. They are sold by Strange Trader too. They can also via recipes be converted from one type to another

original: The sole purpose of BL9 Safety Bases is to make safe areas for people to live, work, love, procreate, make families, have children, adopt children, live as a civilization in. Even without active Energy Shield, these are still relatively safe areas to live in, try to do things that I have listed. However, to ensure protection from all living horrors of Cataclysm, we need actually to have active Energy Shield hopefully. You can still try to do things from this list whenever you want to. Just try to help me with cleaning, alright? Humans along with 'Alliance' are not that different. Both make a lot of mess when they eat or have a sexual intercourse. Don't ask me how I know this
translation: BL9安全基地的唯一目的是为人们提供生活、工作、相爱、繁衍、建立家庭、生儿育女、领养孩童以及作为文明生存的安全区域。即使没有启用能量护盾，这些地方仍是相对安全的生活区，可以尝试实现我列出的种种生活目标。然而，为了确保抵御大灾变中所有活着的恐怖威胁，我们实际上需要激活能量护盾，希望如此。无论何时，你都可以尝试完成这份清单上的事项。只不过，帮我打扫卫生的时候多用点心，好吗？人类与“联盟”在这方面并无太大差异，他们在进食或进行性行为时都会弄得一团糟。别问我怎么知道的。

original: The sole purpose of BL9 Safety Bases is to make safe areas for people to live, work, love, procreate, make families, have children, adopt children, live as a civilization in. Thanks to your work, we have an active Energy Shield now, which makes an already relatively safe area a beacon of hope, civilization for people, for you also. My masters advise you to make this your permanent, safe home here. Try to do things that I have listed. Try to do what, in the past, was a luxury, but thanks to your work now is accessible, is what all people should strive for hopefully. Just try to help me with cleaning, alright? Humans along with 'Alliance' are not that different. Both make a lot of mess when they eat or have a sexual intercourse. Don't ask me how I know this
translation: BL9安全基地的唯一宗旨是为人们提供生活、工作、恋爱、繁衍、组建家庭、养育子女或领养子女的庇护所，让文明得以延续。在您的努力下，我们现已激活了能量护盾，这使得本就相对安全的区域成为了希望的灯塔，为人们，也为您自己，点亮了文明的曙光。我的主人建议您将这里作为永久和安全的家园。请尝试去做那些我列举的事情，尝试去做那些在过去被视为奢侈，而如今因您的努力变得触手可及的事情，希望所有人都能为此而努力。就请您帮我一起打扫卫生，好吗？人类与“联盟”在这方面并无太大差异，他们在进食或进行性行为时都会弄得一团糟。别问我怎么知道这些的。

original:
These alien species are native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet of Wanzeltiums, Ulniviunite are pangolin-like creatures, they breed and live in sandy cave areas located on shores of this planet, they have a body covered with slime coated thick and durable scales, underbelly and tail grotesquely fleshy and slimy, lamprey-type mouth with a menacingly looking set of teeth, long anteater-like tongue along with incredibly thick and sturdy claws on the end of it's limbs.
 
    Obviously Wanzeltiums have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation:
这些外星物种原产于美丽而茂密的丛林般的野生森林星球万泽尔提乌斯，乌尔尼维乌斯是穿山甲般的生物，它们在这个星球海岸的沙质洞穴地区繁殖和生活，它们的身体覆盖着黏液覆盖的厚而耐用的鳞片，腹部和尾部肉质和黏液怪异，七鳃鳗型的嘴，长着一副威胁性的牙齿，长长的食蚁兽般的舌头，四肢末端有着难以置信的粗而结实的爪子。

很明显，万泽尔提乌斯把它们带到了这里，可能是为了把它们作为注射BL9的实验对象，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心地接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了变异

original:
These alien species are native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet of Wanzeltiums. Ulniviunite are pangolin-like creatures, they breed and live in sandy cave areas located on shores of this planet. They have a body covered with slime, coated thick and durable scales, underbelly and tail grotesquely fleshy and slimy, lamprey-type mouth with a menacingly looking set of teeth, long anteater-like tongue along with incredibly thick and sturdy claws on the end of it's limbs.
 
    Obviously, Wanzeltiums have brought them here. Possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9, since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here. We must approach them carefully. If they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation:
这些外星物种原生于一颗名为万泽尔蒂姆的星球，该星球拥有美丽而茂密的丛林般的野生森林。乌尔尼维安体是类似穿山甲的生物，它们在该行星海岸边的沙洞区域繁殖和生活。它们的身体覆盖着粘液，披挂着厚重而坚韧的鳞片，腹部和尾巴异常肥厚且湿润，拥有类似七鳃鳗的口器，配备着一套看起来威胁性十足的牙齿，以及长长的类似食蚁兽的舌头，其四肢末端长有异常粗壮坚固的爪子。

显然，万泽尔蒂姆人将它们带到了这里。可能是为了用BL9病毒进行实验，因为这正是“联盟”来到这里的首要原因。我们必须小心翼翼地接近它们。如果它们被注入了BL9，那么其中许多可能也已经发生了变异。

original:
These alien species are native to a beautiful water planet of Davranides, Inhravtidius resemble crustacean-like creatures, they breed and live in caves, corrals of this planet, they have a thick curved carapace, 2 antennas protruding from their heads, multiple eyes, quickly moving tiny legs and 2 sharp and spiked pincers.
 
    Obviously Davranides have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation:
这些外来物种原产于美丽的水上星球达夫拉尼德斯，因赫拉夫蒂迪乌斯与甲壳类动物相似，它们在这个星球的洞穴、畜栏中繁殖和生活，它们有一个厚而弯曲的甲壳，两个天线从头部伸出，多只眼睛，快速移动的小腿和两个尖尖的钳子。

显然，达夫拉尼德斯把它们带到了这里，可能是因为用它们作为注射BL9的实验对象，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了变异。

original: They call themselves 'Alliance', 4 alien tribes from different planets who have managed to turn into actual advanced alien civilizations with the help of unique energy sources on their planets that they've learned to use as advanced craft material, a type of a fuel, even learning to use it as weapons, conjuring energy mass to use against their enemies. Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well
translation: 他们称自己为“联盟”，4个来自不同星球的外星部落，借助于他们星球上独特的能源，他们已经学会了将其用作先进的工艺材料，一种燃料，甚至学会了将其用作武器，召唤能量来对付敌人。阿尔加诺、万泽尔提乌斯、达夫拉尼德斯、萨尔德尼等

original: They call themselves 'Alliance', an alien alliance of Earth pillagers that consists of 4 alien tribes from different planets. Each is a former savage, but they have managed to turn into actual advanced alien civilizations with the help of unique energy sources on their planets. Essentially they have learned to form materials out of this energy. This includes advanced craft materials, a type of a fuel. They have even learned to use it as weapons, conjuring energy mass to use against their enemies. They are Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well
translation: 他们自称为“联盟”，一个由来自不同星球的四个外星部落组成的地球掠夺者联盟。每个部落曾是野蛮的存在，但借助各自星球上独特的能源，他们成功进化为真正的先进外星文明。本质上，他们学会了从这些能源中合成物质，包括先进的飞船材料和一种燃料。他们甚至掌握了将其作为武器的技巧，能够召唤能量体对抗敌人。这些部落分别是阿加诺伊德人、万泽尔蒂姆人、达夫兰伊德人和萨尔登伊姆人。

original:
They have created few of these special `commander` samples, possibly infusing their generals or key players, definitely The Castlelan himself as well because he has shown immense interest in these due to his occult beliefs, there are some more details to this.
 
    The details is that we are not exactly sure what else they have done with these samples, they might have created more different, heavily mutated types, to create stronger minions, something that will be used in cases when a more destructive, more powerful force is needed, I'm unaware whether they have 'kindly' provided The Castlelan with some of these, and how many of them are here or what they are currently working on in their main facilities, but they DO exist, so you have to be on watch, these are very strong and deadly creatures with their unique `traits`

This Castle - an enormous magnificent work of art of medievals' engineers, many generations of castlelans were living here pretty much in total isolation from the outer world, they mostly exploited their own rural lands and villages for constant supply of food and water, barely communicating with the modern civilization.
 
    I've heard many rumors about them - that they are dealing with occult beliefs, have created their own religion, do sacrifices even, believing in the `returning` of some kind of a chaotic deity that would destroy our entire world's human population, it's civilization entirely to restore the balance, build a new world, a new civilization with the aid of that deity.
 
    Not a long while after the Cataclysm, thanks to our portable radars and scout drones we have noticed some very strong signal interferences that not only jammed everything but burned to the crisp both our radars and drones, the magnitude and the radius of the EMP damage was incredibly big, unlike any interference we've ever seen.
 
    Eventually we've found out that the cause of this was a shimmering portal appearing for a certain amount of time in the mines under that Castle, which spawned a new type of blob it seems that by this time has already fully infused with the inhabitants of The Castle, one of our spies pretending to be a goods trader managed to lure out some of the guards outside, as soon as she approached them, they attacked her in a very aggressive manner trying to eat her flesh murmuring some strange gibberish...

This Cataclysm, mutants, weird creatures, bandits, aliens, cults, really vile organizations, 'Alliance', all of this changes us with time. Survival becomes our main priority. We kill, we destroy, we don't trust anyone. Some forget what conscience is even. There is still a hope, many of these horrors or microorganisms can be used to our advantage, such as equipment based on alien technologies, creating healthy mutations or drugs based on modified microorganisms to make them benign, to fend off anything that corrupts us.
 
    I don't know if we can still love or have children, but we must try, we all must try. I believe that we have a tiny bit of God's energy within us. With it we don't get entirely corrupted by vile sources, retaining our humane side. Based on this, we need to survive, to ascertain that ideas of good, hope, ethics, love will not be obsolete as well
translation:
这场大灾难，突变体，奇怪的生物，土匪，外星人，邪教，真正邪恶的组织，“联盟”，所有这些都随着时间的推移而改变我们。生存成为我们的首要任务。我们杀人，我们毁灭，我们不相信任何人。有些人甚至忘记了什么是良心。我们仍然有希望，这些恐怖或微生物中的许多可以用于我们的优势，例如基于外星技术的设备，创造健康的突变或基于改良微生物的药物，使其变得良性，以抵御任何腐蚀我们的东西。

我不知道我们是否还能爱孩子，但我们必须尝试，我们都必须尝试。我相信我们内心有一点点上帝的能量。有了它，我们就不会被邪恶的消息来源完全腐蚀，保留我们人性的一面。基于此，我们需要生存，以确定善、希望、道德、爱的观念也不会过时

original: This question is much more intelligent than the other one. My creators can be described as a bunch of highly technological geeks majority of which are humans honestly. They neither possess that many combat skills nor they are that interested in subjecting their lives to unnecessary risk clearly. They only engage hostile creatures for basic survival needs. They try to rely on self-sufficiency with relative success thanks to their applied intelligence along with tech that they have managed to find or engineer themselves. They have made these projectors so that we can help each other. We provide you with locations with dangerous creatures along with valuable items or survivors who are captive. You clear these locations acquiring whatever valuable items or survivors you want from there making these locations safe shelters where we including you can live hopefully as well
translation: 这个问题比另一个显得更有智慧。我的创造者们可以被描述为一群高科技宅，其中绝大多数是人类，坦白说。他们并不具备太多战斗技能，也显然不热衷于将他们的生活置于不必要的危险之中。他们仅在满足基本生存需求时才会与敌对生物交战。凭借应用智慧及他们设法找到或自行研发的技术，他们相对成功地实现了自给自足。他们制造了这些投影仪，以便我们能够相互帮助。我们向你们提供存在危险生物、贵重物品或被俘幸存者的地点信息。你们清除这些地点，获取所需的贵重物品或解救幸存者，使这些地方成为安全的避难所，希望包括我们在内，都能在那里安全生活。
context:

original:
This really is a cheap romance novel name! Though, I actually find it funny. I was getting a robotics engineering degree in my university. I always found applied math, physics pretty fun. My brother, the cop in our family, approved of my decision, he is all fists and fighting, so analytical one in our family is a must. As my dear says about his first day of corporal rank experience, I felt the same way back then. Love, no. Safety, protection, yes. That's how I felt back then. My brother was missing, I was alone on the streets, searching for him, when the whole city went to shit. I ran as fast as I could to nearest building, coming across him. A guy in a police uniform, aiming his gun at me, telling me to get down. So I did, out of fear, yet he killed a shambler behind me.
 
    We made our way in his car to police station, which, disappointingly, was also infested with these mutants. Most were shamblers, but there was this horrible type. A fleshy beast with a grotesque head, long tongue, no eyes, and long claws size of a human. We were chased by a giant brute in this building. As we were hiding from it, I found documents proving that my brother left That City weeks ago to do his private investigation. Also we found a secret underground passage in That City's police station. It was leading to some kind of a laboratory complex, which answered most of our questions in terms of what the heck even happened in That City.
 
    This entire lab was a huge conspiracy. Unsanctioned bioweapons experiments. An incident with bioweapon leak was a result of lab's main mutated scientist going mad over his secret creation being stolen by some private military. On our way out of lab, we saved this scientist's daughter. Three of us barely made it out of there safely via an underground train system with that scientist beast and a huge brute chasing us
translation:
这真是个廉价言情小说的名字！不过，我觉得挺逗的。我在大学攻读机器人工程学位，一直觉得应用数学、物理挺有趣的。我家的警察哥哥支持我的选择，他那全是拳头和搏斗的世界里，家里有个善于分析的人是必须的。正如我亲爱的描述他第一天当警官的经历那样，我当时也有同感。爱情，没有；安全、保护，是的。那就是我当时的感受。哥哥失踪了，我独自一人在街上寻找他，整个城市却陷入了混乱。我拼命跑到最近的建筑物里，就在那里遇见了他。一个穿着警服的男子，用枪指着我，让我趴下。出于恐惧，我照做了，但他却在我身后杀了一个蹒跚者。

我们驾车前往警察局，遗憾的是，那里也遭到了这些变异体的侵袭。大多数是蹒跚者，但还有一种可怕的类型。一个肉质的怪物，头部畸形，长舌头，无眼，手指如人一般长。在这栋建筑里，一只巨大的壮汉追着我们。在躲避它的过程中，我发现了一些文件，证明我哥哥几周前就离开这座城市去进行私人调查了。同时，我们在那座城市的警察局发现了一条秘密地下通道。这条通道通向某种实验室综合体，解答了我们关于这座城市到底发生了什么的大部分疑问。

整个实验室背后隐藏着一个巨大的阴谋。未经批准的生物武器实验。一场生物武器泄漏事故，起因是实验室的主要科学家因自己的秘密作品被某私营军事组织窃取而发狂。在我们离开实验室的路上，救出了那位科学家的女儿。我们三人加上那个科学家的女儿，勉强通过地下火车系统安全逃离，身后紧跟着那个科学家变成的怪兽和那只巨大的壮汉。
context:

original:
This strange liquified being, it gives inhumane powers to whoever consumes it. Our miners in mines of our Great Castlelan's Creation managed to find it, some consumed it instantly out of curiousity they had. It killed ones who were not worthy of our Deity's magnificent blessing, but it gave incredible powers to ones worthy of it.
 
    We believe this to be a blood of our Deity, a blessing given to us, means to mark us as worthy warriors to destroy heretics, anyone who opposes creation of New World, who disregards our beliefs, who presumes us to be madmen. We must fight fools and obstacles on our way, our vile enemies
translation:
这种奇怪的液化生物，无论谁食用它，它都会给人不人道的力量。在我们伟大的卡斯特兰创造的矿井里，我们的矿工们设法找到了它，一些人出于好奇，立即把它吃掉了。它杀死了那些不值得我们的神伟大祝福的人，但它给了那些值得祝福的人不可思议的力量。

我们相信这是我们神的血液，是给予我们的祝福，这意味着我们是有价值的战士，可以消灭异端，任何反对创造新世界的人，任何无视我们信仰的人，任何认为我们是疯子的人。我们必须与路上的愚人和障碍作斗争，我们邪恶的敌人

original:
This strange liquified being, it gives inhumane powers to whoever consumes it. Our miners in mines of our Great Castlelan's Creation managed to find it. Some consumed it instantly out of curiousity they had. It killed ones who were not worthy of our Deity's magnificent blessing, but it gave incredible powers to ones worthy of it.
 
    We believe this to be a blood of our Deity, a blessing given to us. These are means to mark us as worthy warriors to destroy heretics, anyone who opposes creation of New World, who disregards our beliefs, who presumes us to be madmen. We must fight fools and obstacles on our way, our vile enemies
translation:
这种奇异的液态生物，能赋予吞食者非人的力量。我们大城堡兰创造矿脉中的矿工们有幸发现了它。出于好奇，一些人立刻进行了尝试。它淘汰了那些不配承受神明伟大力量恩赐的人，而对那些值得这份恩赐的人来说，则赋予了不可思议的力量。
 
 我们相信，这是神明之血，赐予我们的恩泽。这是标记我们为合格战士的方式，去摧毁异端，消灭所有反对新世界创造、蔑视我们信仰、认为我们是疯子的人。我们必须清除道路上的愚者和障碍，对抗那些卑鄙的敌人。

original: Ulniviunite Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: it's body is entirely covered with mucousy thick and durable scales, it's head is shrinked - it's mouth has turned into a lamprey-type one with forked-tongue-like 2 long spiked tentacles hanging from it, grotesquely fleshy set of spiked tentacles emerge from 3 sides of it's back, it's hands have turned into incredibly sharp and sturdy claws. original:
Usually we are not interested in projects of these savages. Majority of them are either dumb mutants, used for killing, or power hungry fools, obsessed with domination of local areas. They don't even care about improving living conditions for their own people. However, there are a few human scientists, who have told me about their most experienced scientist. It is the leader of 'True Superiors' organization at the same time essentially. Humans are feeble, mostly are worthless. But not this man. Even I, representative of a superior race, fear this man. It's like he is not even a man at this point. So what they said is that on their Militarized Island, with instructions made by this man, they developed a Super Soldier.
 
    I came to Militarized Island to see quality of their work. It was pretty good, still, lacking many features that we could add. It was obviously a carefully made humanoid amalgamation of mutated animals that each of our 'Alliance' races brought here. Later when I wanted to talk with these scientists about our own, Davranides' projects, they told me that this man knows that I was one of the few Davranides scientists who showed interest in Super Soldier Project. Scientists said that this man insists that we enhance this project further. I said that I am not sure, but scientists simply replied. They said that Davranides will take on this work if 'Alliance' as a whole values their safety on Earth essentially. We don't want to make enemies out of our allies. We continued this project ourselves. Enhanced versions can be found in various impact sites Cave Systems, whereas experimental enhanced versions can be found in our own Mobile Bases
translation:
通常我们对这些野蛮人的项目并不感兴趣。他们中的大多数要么是被用来杀戮的愚钝变异体，要么是对控制局部区域充满渴望的愚蠢掌权者。他们甚至不关心改善自己人民的生活条件。然而，有几位人类科学家向我提到了他们最资深的科学家。此人同时也是“真正优越者”组织的领袖，本质上来说。人类大体上弱小且大多无足轻重，但这个人除外。即便是作为优越种族代表的我，也对这个人感到畏惧。他似乎已经超越了凡人的范畴。据他们所说，在他们的军事化岛屿上，根据这个人的指示，他们研发出了超级战士。
 
 我来到军事化岛屿，目的是考察他们工作的质量。成果相当不错，但仍缺乏许多我们可以加入的特性。显而易见，这是一个精心制作的人形混合体，融合了我们“联盟”各种族带到这里的变异动物。后来，当我想与这些科学家讨论我们达夫兰迪斯自己的项目时，他们告诉我，这个人知道我是少数对超级战士项目表示兴趣的达夫兰迪斯科学家之一。科学家们说，这个人坚持要我们将此项目进一步强化。我表示不确定，但科学家们只是简单地回复道，如果“联盟”作为一个整体从根本上重视他们在地球上的安全，达夫兰迪斯将会承担这项工作。我们不想把盟友变成敌人。于是我们自行继续了这个项目。增强版可以在各个撞击地点的洞穴系统中找到，而实验性的增强版则可以在我们的移动基地中发现。

original:
We all contribute to our society's advancing. Genetical splicing of microorganisms, creation of mutagens along with drugs based on their properties, lots of work on peculiar ones, such as symbiotes, we excel at all of this. Our society does it's best to 'direct' our own people to the right way, even if it means prohibitions or strict rules to abide by for our own citizens. Some fools even say, 'exploiting' or simply 'experimenting on' inferior races, it's for their own good, it's for our own society's good.
 
    Our government, our diligently working scientists, researchers, subjects, all work for the sake of Davranides' future of all of us united with no traces of opposition between us. With BL9, a unique, flexible, powerful symbiote, we will be able to alter our own race genetically to be the dominant race across hundreds of galaxies. Calculating Wanzeltiums with other races all across galaxies depending on them will be our mere slaves when we use BL9 to advance our race as well
translation:
我们都为社会进步做出了贡献。微生物的基因剪接，根据其特性产生诱变剂和药物，对特殊的诱变剂（如共生体）进行大量研究，我们在所有这些方面都很擅长。我们的社会最好是“引导”我们自己的人民走上正确的道路，即使这意味着我们自己的公民必须遵守禁令或严格的规则。有些傻瓜甚至说，‘利用’或只是‘试验’劣等种族，这是为了他们自己的利益，也是为了我们自己的社会的利益。

我们的政府，我们勤奋工作的科学家、研究人员、研究对象，都是为了达夫拉尼德斯的未来而工作的，我们大家团结一致，没有任何反对的迹象。有了BL9，一种独特、灵活、强大的共生体，我们将能够从基因上改变我们自己的种族，成为数百个星系中的主导种族。当我们使用BL9来推进我们的种族时，计算万泽尔提乌斯和所有星系中依赖它们的其他种族将仅仅是我们的奴隶

original:
We are led by one of the brightest minds that exists during our times. The only way to rebuild this world is to create disciplined, fully obedient people, that will not dare to question our leadership, ranging from regular civilians to physically enhanced soldiers and even mutated amalgamations to use as our elite soldiers. With BL9 that's very much possible. These who will not bow down to us to accept us as leaders will be forced to infuse themselves with our own modified version of BL9
 
    Also, based on BL9's properties, it counters The Blob, Triffids, Mycus entirely. This in addition to the fact that it's absolutely benign, hardly a weapon, but with a few tweaks, of course, it can be turned into a true weapon. With huge amounts of resources, weapons, materials, workforce including scientists and engineers, we can expand as an organization. Maybe even assert dominance across local areas. With more hosts, maybe even across entire country, possibly even across the world

original:
We are led by one of the brightest minds that exists during our times. The only way to rebuild this world is via infusing people with BL9, creating disciplined, fully obedient hosts ranging from regular civilians to physically enhanced soldiers and even mutated amalgamations to use as our elite soldiers.
 
    Also, based on BL9's properties, it counters The Blob, Triffids, Mycus entirely, being absolutely benign, with a few tweaks of course, compared to others. With huge amounts of resources, weapons, materials, workforce including scientists and engineers, we can expand, assert dominance across local areas then with enough hosts, across entire country, then even across the world
translation:
我们是由我们这个时代最聪明的人领导的。重建这个世界的唯一途径是向人们灌输BL9，创造纪律严明、完全服从的主人，从普通平民到体能增强的士兵，甚至将变异的混编部队用作我们的精英士兵。

同样，基于BL9的属性，它完全对抗了变形怪、三尖树和马卡斯，是绝对良性的，当然，与其他的相比，有一些调整。有了大量的资源、武器、材料、劳动力，包括科学家和工程师，我们可以在本地区、在全国、甚至全世界范围内扩张、维护主导地位

original:
We are led by one of the brightest minds that exists during our times. The only way to rebuild this world is via infusing people with BL9, creating disciplined, fully obedient hosts, ranging from regular civilians to physically enhanced soldiers and even mutated amalgamations to use as our elite soldiers.
 
    Also, based on BL9's properties, it counters The Blob, Triffids, Mycus entirely. This in addition to the fact that it's absolutely benign, with a few tweaks of course. With huge amounts of resources, weapons, materials, workforce including scientists and engineers, we can expand as an organization. Maybe even assert dominance across local areas. With more hosts, maybe even across entire country, possibly even across the world
translation:
我们由当代最杰出的智者之一领导。重建这个世界的唯一途径是通过注入BL9病毒，创造出从普通民众到经过物理增强的士兵，甚至是变异融合体作为我们的精英战士，使之成为纪律严明、绝对服从的宿主。
 
此外，根据BL9的特性，它能完全抑制粘液怪、类人植物和菌毯。而且，经过些许调整后，它是完全无害的。凭借庞大的资源、武器、材料以及包括科学家和工程师在内的劳动力，我们可以作为组织扩张。也许甚至能在局部地区确立统治地位。随着更多宿主的增加，或许还能覆盖整个国家，乃至全世界。

original:
We change as we advance. In terms of our technological advancements, no other race is match for us, but this turns us into cruel, devious, calculating tyrants slowly. We've monopolized tech markets successfully in our, also in local galaxy systems. We've grown proud of ourselves so much that conquered races are shunned upon by our native citizens, exploited by local companies as slaves.
 
    This entire attempt to seize BL9 on a ravaged planet, killing everyone on sight including humans, proves my point. We've formed an 'Alliance' with 'adventurers' or pirates, Arganoides. We deal with violent wars waging warriors and mercenaries, Saldeniums. Though, Davranides are the most shady of them all. I've never seen a race so obsessed with genetical splicing or mutations, I've heard stories of how tyrannical their superiors are, 'directing' all of their citizens according to their own world view as well
translation:
我们随着前进而改变。就我们的技术进步而言，没有其他种族能与我们匹敌，但这让我们慢慢变成了残忍、狡猾、精打细算的暴君。我们已经成功地垄断了我们的技术市场，也垄断了当地的银河系统。我们为自己感到骄傲，以至于被征服的种族被我们的本土公民排斥，被当地公司当作奴隶剥削。

在一个被蹂躏的星球上夺取BL9，杀死包括人类在内的所有人的整个企图证明了我的观点。我们已经与“冒险家”或海盗阿加诺伊德结成了“联盟”。我们对付的是由战士和雇佣兵发动的暴力战争。不过，达夫拉尼德斯是其中最阴暗的。我从未见过一个种族如此痴迷于基因剪接或突变，我也听说过他们的上级是多么残暴，他们根据自己的世界观“指挥”所有的公民

original:
We represent a secret organization that has existed pre-Cataclysm as well, our current goals are researching peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids, without a doubt finding efficient ways to survive, restore our former main hub's glory, make some kind of a safe place for people to live, work, love in as well.
 
    It will take a lot of time especially with fending off these invaders, dealing with these microorganisms and experimenting on mutations to possibly find a way to counter it somehow
translation:
我们代表着一个在大灾难前就存在的秘密组织，我们目前的目标是研究特殊的外来微生物、矿物、气体和液体，毫无疑问，找到有效的生存方式，恢复我们以前的主要中心的荣耀，为人们的生活、工作和爱情创造一个安全的地方。

这将花费大量时间，尤其是抵御这些入侵者、处理这些微生物和进行突变试验，以找到某种对抗它的方法。

original:
We represent a secret organization that has existed pre-Cataclysm as well. Our current goals are researching peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids. Also, no doubt, one of our top priorities is finding efficient ways to survive, restore our former main hub's glory. A dream of ours to make some kind of a safe place for people to live, work, love each other in as well.
 
    It will take a lot of time, especially with fending off these invaders, dealing with other microorganisms, like Mycus, Triffids, and experimenting on mutations to possibly find a way to counter The Blob somehow
translation:
我们代表着一个在大灾变前就已存在的秘密组织。目前的目标包括研究奇异的外星微生物、矿石、气体和液体。毫无疑问，我们的首要任务之一是寻找有效的生存之道，以及重建我们昔日主基地的辉煌。我们梦想着能创造一个安全之地，让人们在此生活、工作、彼此相爱。
  
这将是一个漫长的过程，特别是要抵御入侵者，应对诸如菌族(Mycus)、三脚怪(Triffids)等其他微生物的威胁，以及通过实验变异来探寻某种可能对抗Blob的方法。

original:
We specialize in research in terms of learning about inner structure and uses of peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids, including The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, BL9 but mostly BL9 these days because out of all of them, BL9 is the most unique, flexible, relatively easily to affect and alter, change it's structure.
 
    It's unique abilities can lead to horrible mutations or possibly some kind of a cure or protection from other microorganisms as well
translation:
我们专注于研究特殊外来微生物、矿物、气体和液体的内部结构和用途，包括变形怪、马卡斯、三尖树、BL9，但现在主要是BL9，因为BL9是其中最独特、最灵活、相对容易影响和改变其结构的。

它的独特能力可能导致可怕的突变，也可能是某种治疗或保护免受其他微生物的伤害。

original:
We specialize in research in terms of learning about inner structure and uses of peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids. This also includes The Blob, Mycus, Triffids. Newest one that we research more diligently is BL9, because out of all of them, BL9 is the most unique, flexible. Based on initial experiments, it is pretty easy to affect and alter, change it's structure.
 
    It's unique abilities can lead to horrible mutations or possibly some kind of a cure or protection from other microorganisms as well
translation:
我们专注于研究奇异外星微生物、矿物、气体及液体的内部结构及其应用。这涵盖了包括Blob、Mycus、Triffids在内的多种异常生物。我们目前正尤为细致地研究BL9，因为在所有研究对象中，BL9最为独特且适应性强。初步实验表明，它很容易受到影响和改变，其结构可被轻易调整。

其独一无二的特性可能导致可怕的变异，也可能为抵抗其他微生物提供某种治愈或保护手段。

original: Welcome to BL9 Safety Base, I am a control Android. We are one system of multiple control machines connected via a network. We are built with a purpose to ensure safe work of all systems in BL9 Safety Bases. If you are new here, I suggest you to access my storage system with intel along with journals in order to learn as much information as possible about essentially everything related to BL9, which has been collected by my masters, this is a must. If you are already experienced, know what our main goals are, feel free to ask me questions that you have
translation: 欢迎来到BL9安全基地，我是控制安卓。我们是通过网络连接的多台控制机器系统的一员。我们的建造旨在确保BL9安全基地内所有系统的安全运行。如果您是新来的，我建议您访问我的情报存储系统以及日志记录，以便尽可能多地了解与BL9相关的一切信息，这些信息都是由我的创建者们收集的，这是必不可少的一步。如果您已经经验丰富，明确我们的主要目标，随时可以向我提出您的疑问。

original: Welcome to BL9 Safety Base, survivor of hope in life, you don't mind if I call you like this? All systems are online, Energy Shield works exactly as my masters, as we have all, hoped for, thanks to your work! If inhabitants decide to go outside, shield will be deactivated for a split second then turned on again. If inhabitants decide to go back here, scanners, installed near entrance, will scan them, if they are former inhabitants, inhabitants will be able to go back here, shield will be deactivated for split second then turned back on again. My masters ordered me to advise you to make this your permanent, safe home here. Make a family, bring your love here, have children, adopt children, live as a civilization hopefully as well
translation: 欢迎来到BL9安全基地，作为生命希望的幸存者，您不介意我这样称呼您吧？所有系统均已在线，能量护盾正如我们所有人所期望的那样正常运作，这多亏了您的努力！如果居民决定外出，护盾将瞬间关闭然后再重新激活。若居民决定返回，入口处安装的扫描器将会对他们进行扫描，若是基地的前居民，他们将能够返回，护盾同样会瞬间解除后再重新开启。我的创建者吩咐我提醒您，将这里作为您永久且安全的家。组建家庭，将您的爱带到这儿，生育子女，领养孩童，希望你们能像一个文明社会一样生活下去。

original: Welcome to this magnificent, sophisticated structure, little moth, it is great that you have arrived here, we are still in the middle of our rituals, but so far it seems that The Great and Fierce Nevulion heard us and bestowed upon us His great `blessing`, but you, you will not receive it, my men will cleanse this place of your filth, you will NOT be able to defile it!
translation: 欢迎来到这座宏伟而复杂的建筑，小飞蛾，你来到这里真是太好了，我们还处在我们的仪式当中，但到目前为止，似乎伟大而凶猛的Nevulion听到了我们并给予了我们巨大的`祝福'，但是你，你*不会*得到它，我的人会净化这个地方的你的污秽，你绝不允许弄脏它！

original: Welcome to this magnificent, sophisticated structure, little moth. It is great that you have arrived here. We are still in the middle of our rituals, but so far it seems that The Great and Fierce Nevulion heard us and bestowed upon us His great `blessing`. But you, you will not receive it, my men will cleanse this place of your filth, you will NOT be able to defile it!
translation: 欢迎来到这座宏伟精致的建筑，小飞蛾。你能抵达这里真是太好了。我们正在进行仪式之中，但到目前为止，似乎伟大而凶猛的内维尔里安听到了我们的呼唤，赐予了我们祂伟大的「恩赐」。但你，你无法得到这份恩赐，我的部下会将你这污秽从这里清除，你休想玷污此地！

original:
Well, Arganoides are adventurers, explorers, mercenaries in general native to a swamp-like shrouded by purple fog of some sorts planet, they are proficient at tracking, searching for anything that they consider valuable, it is their greatest skill.
 
    They are tall graceful humanoid beings, emitting bright purple crystalline light, it's head resembles a water shaped droplet with hair-like long tentacles growing out of it, it has elongated eyes as well
translation:
好吧，阿加诺维德人是冒险家，探险家，雇佣兵，通常生活在一个被紫色雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球上，他们擅长跟踪，寻找任何他们认为有价值的东西，这是他们最大的技能。

它们是高大优雅的人形生物，发出明亮的紫色水晶光，它的头部像一个水状的水滴，头发一样长的触手从它长出来，它有细长的眼睛。

original:
Well, Arganoides are adventurers, explorers, mercenaries in general. They are native to a swamp-like shrouded by purple fog of some sorts planet. They are proficient at tracking, searching for anything that they consider valuable, it is their greatest skill.
 
    They are tall graceful humanoid beings, emitting bright purple crystalline light. It's head resembles a water shaped droplet with hair-like long tentacles growing out of it, it has elongated eyes as well
translation:
嗯，阿加诺伊德人是冒险家、探索者，总的来说就是雇佣兵。他们原生于一个被某种紫色迷雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球。他们擅长追踪，寻找任何他们认为有价值的东西，这是他们的最大技能。

他们的身高挺拔，形态优雅，散发着明亮的紫色水晶光芒。头部形似水滴，长有发丝状的触须，还拥有细长的眼睛。

translation: 阿尔加诺原产于一颗被紫色雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球，万泽尔提姆原产于一颗美丽茂密的丛林般的野生森林星球，达夫兰尼德斯是一个美丽的水星球的原住民，萨尔德尼亚原产于一个像火山一样贫瘠荒地的星球。

original: Well, Arganoides are native to a swamp-like shrouded by purple fog of some sorts planet. Wanzeltiums are native to a beatiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet. Davranides are native to a beautiful water planet. Saldeniums are native to a volcanic barren wasteland-like planet. Humanoids, indeed, but are all entirely different compared to each other
translation: 嗯，阿加诺伊德斯原产于一片被某种紫色迷雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球。万泽尔蒂姆斯则原产于一个美丽而茂密的丛林般的荒野森林行星。达夫兰德斯源自一颗美丽的水世界行星。萨尔登尼姆斯则来自一个火山遍地、荒芜如末日的行星。它们确实都是类人生物，但彼此之间截然不同。

original:
Well, Davranides are scientists, researchers, very professional keepers of scientific knowledge in general native to a beautiful water planet, researching microorganisms, splicing them, producing drugs, experimenting with mutagens, symbiotes, is something that they are very skilled at.
 
    They are average height smooth-skinned amphibian-like humanoids, emitting a bright azure-blue crystalline light, having elongated cranium with eyes that protrude from each side of it's head on short stalks, they often have a calculating gaze as well
translation:
达夫拉尼德斯是科学家，研究人员，非常专业的科学知识保管者，通常居住在一个美丽的水星球上，研究微生物，剪接它们，生产药物，试验诱变剂，共生体，是他们非常擅长的事情。

它们是一种平均身高、皮肤光滑的两栖类人形动物，发出明亮的蓝蓝色水晶光，头盖骨细长，眼睛从头部两侧伸出，长在短柄上，它们通常也有一种精打细算的凝视

original:
Well, Davranides are scientists, researchers, very professional keepers of scientific knowledge in general. They are native to a beautiful water planet. They research microorganisms, splice them, produce drugs, experiment with mutagens, symbiotes, all of this is something that they are very skilled at.
 
    They are average height smooth-skinned amphibian-like humanoids, emitting a bright azure-blue crystalline light. It has an elongated cranium with eyes that protrude from each side of it's head on short stalks, they often have a calculating gaze as well
translation:
好吧，达瓦兰人是科学家，研究者，总体上是非常专业的科学知识守护者。他们源自一颗美丽的水之星球。他们研究微生物，进行基因剪接，生产药物，实验突变剂、共生体，这些都是他们非常擅长的领域。

他们的身高普通，皮肤光滑，类似两栖类人形生物，散发出明亮的天蓝色水晶光芒。头部呈椭圆形，眼睛通过短茎从头的两侧伸出，常常展现出深思熟虑的眼神。

original:
Well, Saldeniums are incredibly strong warriors, hunters, mercenaries in general. They are native to a volcanic barren wasteland-like planet. On their planet they wage wars, conquer tribes, hunt animals. In space they hunt people in cases of mercenaries, teach other combat, all of this is something that they are very proficient at.
 
    Because of their savage ways, upon providing combat training to allies of theirs which was the main reason of them being accepted in first place, thanks to support of Arganoides along with pragmatism of Wanzeltiums along with devious ways of Davranides civilizations, they have been expelled from their alliance justly. They evidently objected, but having taught others everything, having no industry, having no less savage, more practical merits of their own, they've become a liability, thrown back to their own planet
translation:
好吧，萨尔登尼姆人是极为强大的战士、猎人和雇佣兵。他们原生于一个火山遍布、荒芜如末日的星球。在他们的星球上，他们进行战争、征服部落、狩猎野兽。而在太空中，作为雇佣兵时他们会追猎人类，传授他人战斗技巧，所有这些都展现了他们高度的精通。
 


由于他们野蛮的行为方式，在为盟友提供战斗训练——这本是他们被接纳的主要原因——的过程中，加之阿加诺伊德人的支持、万泽尔蒂亚姆人的务实态度以及达夫兰迪斯文明的狡猾手段，他们被公正地逐出了联盟。他们显然表示反对，但鉴于他们已将所有技艺传授给了他人，自己没有工业，也没有更实用、不那么野蛮的优势，他们成为了负担，最终被驱逐回了自己的星球。

original:
Well, Saldeniums are incredibly strong warriors, hunters, mercenaries native to a volcanic barren wasteland-like planet, waging wars, conquering tribes, hunting animals and people in cases of mercenaries, teaching combat is something that they are very proficient at.
 
    They are tall leathery-skinned fierce-looking humanoids, emitting a bright solar-orange crystalline light, it's forehead is ridged, it's entire face is covered with multiple curved spikes and it's neck has some sorts of breathing tubes, their gaze is akin to a hunter as well
translation:
萨尔德尼人是非常强大的战士、猎人、雇佣兵，他们出生在一个火山贫瘠的荒原上，像星球一样，发动战争，征服部落，猎杀动物和人，在雇佣兵的情况下，教授战斗是他们非常精通的事情。

它们是高高的皮革皮肤，看起来凶猛的人形生物，发出明亮的太阳橙色水晶光，前额呈脊状，整个脸布满多个弯曲的刺，脖子上有一些呼吸管，它们的目光也类似于猎人

original:
Well, Wanzeltiums are builders, engineers, craftsmen in general native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet, they are masters of creating magnificent structures, ingeniously made tech, sturdy and durable armor along with strong weapons, it is their greatest skill.
 
    They are over 5'8 feet tall reptile-like humanoids, emitting a bright green crystalline light, with a reptilian-humanoid head having a greatly widened forehead covered with multiple thick skin lines, multiple hair-like spiky protrusions coming out of the back and sides of it's head, having wide eyes as well
translation:
嗯，万泽尔提乌斯是建筑商、工程师、工匠，通常居住在一个美丽而茂密的丛林般的荒野森林星球上，他们是创造宏伟建筑的大师，巧妙地制造技术，坚固耐用的盔甲以及强大的武器，这是他们最大的技能。

它们身高超过5英尺8英寸，像爬虫类人形动物，发出明亮的绿色水晶光，像爬虫类人形动物的头部前额大大加宽，覆盖着多条厚厚的皮肤线，背部和头部两侧有多个毛发状的尖突，眼睛也很宽

original:
Well, Wanzeltiums are builders, engineers, craftsmen in general. They are native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet. They are masters of creating magnificent structures, ingeniously made tech, sturdy and durable armor along with strong weapons, it is their greatest skill.
 
    They are over 5'8 feet tall reptile-like humanoids, emitting a bright green crystalline light. It has a reptilian-humanoid head having a greatly widened forehead covered with multiple thick skin lines, multiple hair-like spiky protrusions coming out of the back and sides of it's head, having wide eyes as well
translation:
好吧，万泽姆人是建造者、工程师和手工艺人的统称。他们源自一颗美丽而茂密的丛林般的野生森林行星。他们是创造宏伟建筑、巧妙制作技术、坚固耐用盔甲以及强力武器的大师，这是他们最杰出的技能。

他们的身高超过5英尺8英寸，类似于爬行动物的人形生物，散发着明亮的绿色结晶光芒。头部呈现爬虫类与人类的混合特征，前额宽广并布满多条粗厚的皮肤纹路，头部后侧及两侧生有多根尖刺状的毛发突起，眼睛宽阔。

original:
Well, former was a very sweet, friendly girl, had that innocent but strong look of an honest, respectable woman in her eyes, not an arrogant like of some rich brat. It was pleasant to be around her. But latter? She was spreading that aura of a dangerous attraction, manipulativeness. It would be hard to avoid her temptations, how alluring she is, if you don't think rationally. I didn't like her much. Type of a woman who would cut someone's throat while pretending to be a friend or even like said someone or whatever lies manipulators say. I can sound harsh towards her, she did help that agent many times but she did work for that genocidal maniac! But agent with president's daughter? These two made me feel at home there, I am sure that these two are safe somewhere out there, like boulder puncher with his military partner along with his sister as well!
 
    Then I moved here because I've heard of world agencies investigating XEDRA experiments. You know, I thought that a single city would be destroyed with a nuke, like with That City, but some wanker in their leadership likely forced these scientists not only to wear ridiculous ties, but also to do more and more interdimensional experiments which resulted in this mess.
translation:
Well, former was a very sweet, friendly girl, had that innocent but strong look of an honest, respectable woman in her eyes, not an arrogant like of some rich brat. It was pleasant to be around her. But latter? She was spreading that aura of a dangerous attraction, manipulativeness. It would be hard to avoid her temptations, how alluring she is, if you don't think rationally. I didn't like her much. Type of a woman who would cut someone's throat while pretending to be a friend or even like said someone or whatever lies manipulators say. I can sound harsh towards her, she did help that agent many times but she did work for that genocidal maniac! But agent with president's daughter? These two made me feel at home there, I am sure that these two are safe somewhere out there, like boulder puncher with his military partner along with his sister as well!
 
    Then I moved here because I've heard of world agencies investigating XEDRA experiments. You know, I thought that a single city would be destroyed with a nuke, like with That City, but some wanker in their leadership likely forced these scientists not only to wear ridiculous ties, but also to do more and more interdimensional experiments which resulted in this mess.

original:
Well, there are 8 biomes that we know about, however there are also lesser known cave biomes systems hidden under 'THEIR' fortification towers. All kinds of dangerous alien creatures inhabit each of them. These include mutated animal types, insectoids, weird mutated creatures, 'THEIR' soldiers, unknown armed faction , advanced aliens civilizations.
 
    Now, most dangerous ones are advanced aliens' mobile bases, where we should not venture until we are strong enough physically, in terms of our equipment, weapons to handle these pillagers. 'Alliance', that's how they call themselves
translation:
我们知道有8种生物群系，但在这之下，还有隐藏于“它们”防御塔下的、较少为人知的洞穴生物群系。各种危险的外星生物栖息于这些群系之中，包括变异动物、昆虫类生物、奇异的突变生物、“它们”的士兵、不明武装势力以及先进的外星文明。
 
其中，最为危险的是先进外星人的移动基地，我们不应轻易涉足，除非我们在体力、装备和武器上足以应对这些掠夺者。“联盟”，他们自称为此。

original:
Well, there are former facilities that we know about with alien fauna along with mutants, however there are also lesser known much more dangerous cave biomes systems hidden beneath fortification towers of 'True Superiors' who seem to be friendly not only with Cult along with 'THEM' but also with 'Alliance' as well. All kinds of dangerous alien creatures inhabit each of them. These include mutated animal types, insectoids, weird mutated creatures, soldiers of 'True Superiors', advanced alien civilizations as well.
 
    Now, most dangerous ones are advanced aliens' mobile bases, where we should not venture until we are strong enough physically, in terms of our equipment, weapons to handle these pillagers. 'Alliance', that's how they call themselves

original:
What do you mean? You don't like quality of writing? Meh, most of what I do here is analyze bunch of romantic sexual fantasy novels honestly. Being a female android who likes to read a lot, this is pretty disgusting. Though uh who am I to judge? I'm just an android made for your use hopefully 
 
    The type of stuff I read often is 'I have learned that my husband orc is cheating on me with my sister, who is apparently my brother, who likes to shapeshift into moose, whereas my twin elven children have jaws which do not resemble elves, which only means that their father, my sister's or brother's husband, is not a pure-blooded elf!'. I think that some of our agents like these types of novels, which is why I have stored in my storage system so many of them.
 
    This stuff, however, seems like it's genuinely based on real survivors who are not into weird fetishes! Except for this narcissist guy, who seems like he would have a sexual intercourse with his own thoughts about his superiority to other humans
translation:
你的意思是不满意我的文字水平？哎，坦白讲，我在这里大多是在研究一堆充满浪漫情色幻想的小说。作为一位爱读书的女性机器人，这其实挺倒胃口的。不过，我又算哪根葱来评判呢？我只是一个为了服务你而存在的机器人，但愿如此——
    
      我经常接触的那些故事，比如“我发现我的兽人配偶竟然与我的姐姐（其实是变身为人的哥哥）有染，而这位兄长还热衷于变化成驼鹿，同时，我的一对精灵血统的子女，下巴特征并不符合精灵族貌，这只能说明，他们父亲——我那姐/兄的伴侣，并非纯正精灵血统！”我想我们有些特工对这类小说情有独钟，因此我才在我的储存系统里收录了大量此类作品。
    
      然而，这些内容看起来却是基于真实幸存者的经历，他们并没有什么怪异的癖好！除了一位极度自恋的家伙，他似乎会因自己优于他人的想法而陷入自我迷恋的境地。

original: Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL, long-time survivors, I am in need of your help, one of the biggest perils after the Cataclysm  has recently arisen out of nowhere, help me, reach The Castle Entrance AS SOON AS YOU CAN

Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL, long-time survivors, we are in need of your help. This map contains locations of 15 structures ranging from gigantic to huge, filled with all sorts of enemies, both human and alien, that either need to be entirely destroyed or captured with your help. All explanations about this you can find in intel or journals. If you want to help us, follow this order of locations.
 
    Castle of Cult, then Anomalies in this order: Abandoned Lab, Cult Lair, Abandoned Factory, Cult Dungeon, then Military Island, then Biomes in this order: Hive Caves, Underground Ruins Caves, Acid Caves, Water Caves, Lava Caves, then Alien Dominators' Mobile Bases in this order: Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well
translation:
无论谁找到了这张地图——这是一个求救信号，长期幸存者，我们需要你们的帮助。这张地图包含15个建筑的位置，从巨大到巨大，充满了各种各样的敌人，包括人类和外星人，它们要么需要被完全摧毁，要么需要在你的帮助下被捕获。关于这一点的所有解释都可以在英特尔或期刊上找到。如果您想帮助我们，请按照以下位置顺序进行操作。
 
邪教城堡，然后依次为：废弃实验室、邪教巢穴、废弃工厂、邪教地牢，然后是军事岛屿，然后依次为生物群落：蜂巢洞穴、地下遗址洞穴、酸性洞穴、水洞、熔岩洞穴，然后依次为外星人主宰者的移动基地：阿尔加诺、万泽尔提乌斯、达夫拉尼德斯，萨尔德尼乌斯

original: Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL. Long-time survivors, we are in need of your help. This map contains locations of BL9 Safety Bases, where you need to go to receive further instructions. All explanations will be provided to you by one of our Base Androids or via printed intel along with journals, which can be found in BL9 Safety Bases, BL9 Libraries, BL9 Bookstores. If you want to help us, go to one of BL9 Safety Bases, where you need to talk to one of our Base Androids to receive further instructions
translation: 无论谁找到这张地图——这是一则求救信号。长期生存者们，我们急需你们的帮助。此地图标注了BL9安全基地的位置，你需要前往这些基地以获取更多指令。所有说明将由我们的基地机器人或通过打印的情报资料，以及可在BL9安全基地、BL9图书馆、BL9书店中找到的日志提供。若你愿意帮助我们，请前往任意一个BL9安全基地，与基地机器人交谈以获取下一步指示。

original: Why are there these hostile armed patrols roaming around? There are even aliens? How can I fight them?
translation: Why are there these hostile armed patrols roaming around? There are even aliens? How can I fight them?

original: With gold and platinum coin COMBINATIONs of course! Check your 'BL9' recipes in your PDA or your Notebook or whatever. You need to collect gold and platinum coins, then craft these combinations - each combination of gold or platinum requires 100 pieces of the CORRESPONDING type - 100 gold is needed to craft 1 gold coin combination, 100 platinum is needed to craft 1 platinum coin combination, stranger! To buy Tier 2 gear you need to have the Tier 1 variant of the same gear in your inventory as well
translation: 当然还有金币和白金币的*组合*！请在您的 PDA 或笔记本或其他设备中查看您的 "BL9 "配方。您需要收集金币和白金币，然后制作这些组合--每个金币或白金组合需要 100 枚*相同*类型的金币或白金币--制作 1 个金币组合需要 100 枚金币，制作 1 个白金组合需要 100 枚白金，等等！要购买 2 级装备，您的库存中还需要有相同装备的 1 级版本。

original: With gold and platinum coin COMBINATIONs of course!Check your 'OTHER' recipes in your PDA or your Notebook or whatever.You need to collect gold and platinum coins, then craft these combinations - each combination of gold or platinum requires 100 pieces of the CORRESPONDING type - 100 gold is needed to craft 1 gold coin combination, 100 platinum is neede to craft 1 platinum coin combination, stranger!

With regards to Castlelan Castle along with Militarized Island locations your rewards which are items can be purchased from Strange Merchant for Gold and Platinum Coins which can be crafted into Gold and Platinum Coins Combinations provided that you have level 3 fabrication along with mechanics skills hopefully. With regards to to majority of other locations your rewards which are items can be acquired upon having these locations cleared entirely which you will find easily if you search for these items with some effort hopefully
translation: 关于Castlelan城堡与军事岛区域，你获取的物品奖励能够以金币和铂金币的形式从奇异商贩那里购得，条件是你已掌握三级制作技艺及机械技能，期待如此。此外，若拥有这些技能，你还可将金币和铂金币组合合成更高价值的币种。至于多数其他区域的物品奖励，则需待你彻底清除该地后方能取得；只要付出一定努力探索，理应能顺利发现这些战利品。

original: YOU DID IT! I cannot believe that you DID IT! The horrible Castle and The Island are no more! I can say now that you can be officially involved into helping achieve mutually beneficial goals hopefully! Go to BL9 Safety Base, this is important. You will be contacted there by one of our most experienced scientists to instruct you further via an Android with a wireless communication system. If you have already been there, you already know everything, return there to continue bringing hope with your actions to you, to all of us hopefully as well
translation: 你成功了！简直不敢相信你真的做到了！那个可怖的城堡和岛屿都不复存在了！现在我可以正式地说，你已经成为我们实现共同利益目标不可或缺的一份子了！请前往BL9安全基地，这事至关重要。在那里，你将会被我们最资深的科学家之一通过一部搭载无线通信系统的安卓设备进一步指导。如果你已经去过那里，想必你已了解一切，回到那里继续用你的行动为所有人带来希望吧，但愿也能为我们所有人带来光明。

original: Yengnutrium Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: 2 asymetrically growing heads - one resembles a mix of a mantis' and fly's head with multiple rapidly blinking eyes - the other resembles a mix of a locust's and cockroach's head with 2 eyes at both sides of it. What's left of it's humanoid body is barely recognizable - it's vertically elongated with 2 winged tentacles protruding from it's back. 2 serrated curved claws in the place of the arms, and 2 spiked far apart insect legs. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's claws
translation: 融合了典型特征的叶nutrium变种合体：拥有两个不对称生长的头颅——一个头颅混合了螳螂和苍蝇的特点，拥有多个快速眨动的眼睛；另一个头颅则混合了蝗虫与蟑螂的特征，两侧各有两个眼睛。其类人形的身体已难以辨认，纵向拉长，背部伸出两只带翼的触须。双臂位置长有锯齿状弯曲的爪子，以及两只有刺且间距较远的昆虫腿。这种生物与其他合体的不同之处在于它体型更大、速度更快，似乎受过作为实验性士兵的训练。它的一只爪中握着一把奇特的、看起来像有机物制成的枪。

original: You fascinate me, stranger! I presume that you are a little oblivious to this key goal that these different factions have in common, all of them. These cultists, military, alien invaders, they are all the evil hostile forces, trying to acquire BL9 to dominate the world! They become stronger and stronger with time which we can notice easily. To counter them effectively, we need to acquire better gear. Some of it I sell, stranger, but there is gear, which also uses benevolent version of BL9, some of which is even stronger than gear that I sell. Maybe I have it, but it's so rare that I would not sell it to anyone! That's because it can be found in their lairs, bases. Look, stranger, BL9 Safety Bases really are great shelters to live in, almost a luxury for us, with their Base Androids having access to hi-tech locating systems to find these places of these hostile forces, stranger

original:
You have a bright mind, stranger! Now, of course, I advise you to go to BL9 Safety Bases first to have proper access to information, to live in comfort to get used to better living conditions, also to be much more tactical, much more strategic, because areas outside of them will be gradually filled with their military, getting stronger and stronger. That's just my advice for you if you want to listen. We still need to get progressively stronger as well to be able to counter them which is why you can always ask me for directions. Now, because you insist, you can have these copies of maps for free. 
 
    So order of clearing hostile places depends on your gear, but here is advised order if you are not sure about your gear. Castlelan Castle, Infested Facility, Militarized Island, Guard Towers with Hive Caves, Underground Ruins, Acidic Caves, Sunken Caves, Molten Caves, Mobile Alliance Base in this order, which is advised, again, only if you are not sure about your gear hopefully. Stranger, it's very important that you at least try to collect gear from these hostile forces places, because their lousy patrols gradually evolve into military forces, like I have said. They evolve from cultists with beasts to soldiers with alien militia along with walking amalgamations, so make sure to collect gear, stranger

original:
You have either managed to find or return to any of BL9 Safety Bases, it is good that you are here, safe! Proceed to Control Sector to talk to Base Android, responsible for safe work of all systems in this particular BL9 Safety Base. You can talk to Base Android to ask her various questions. She has a built-in system which makes her able to read various intel along with journals which we have collected. They are all optional to read, but are advised to read in general. They are all categorized, which only means that she will read them, based on your choices of questions categories along with your questions in general. You can go to Leisure Center to get a beverage or a drink from there. You might wonder why here there is nobody of our organization's representatives? Answer is simple. Safety. You probably understand that we are aware of all kinds of inhabitants roaming around. This includes benevolent survivors, hopefully, you are one of these survivors. At the same time these can be bandits, murderers, maniacs, double agents of Strange Cult, 'THEM', 'True Superiors' obviously. We prefer not to give any chance to either of these horrible bastards to try to weaken or damage our organization.
 
    The most important journal for you to read is 'Instructions for Survivors' which is a must for survival of survivors who are interested in helping our organization achieve it's goal types which we concentrate on for survival of humanity in general. Key goal of our organization is to bring hope, safety, civilization that will guarantee survival, possibility of procreation to survivors hopefully as well
translation:
您已设法找到或回到了任何一个BL9安全基地，您能在这里安全避难真是太好了！请前往控制区与基地机器人对话，她负责该BL9安全基地所有系统的安全运行。您可以向基地机器人询问各种问题，她内置的系统使她能够阅读我们收集的各种情报和日志。这些资料都是可选阅读的，但总体上建议您阅读。它们都经过了分类，这意味着她会根据您选择的问题类别和您的问题来读取它们。您还可以前往休闲中心获取饮料放松一下。

您或许会疑惑为何这里没有我们组织代表的身影？答案很简单——安全考虑。您可能已经意识到，我们知道周围游荡着各种居民，包括善意的幸存者——希望您也是其中之一。同时，也有可能是强盗、杀人犯、狂人，以及来自奇异教派、"他们"、"真正主宰"的双重间谍。我们宁愿不给这些可怕的家伙任何机会来削弱或破坏我们的组织。

对您来说，最重要的是阅读《幸存者指南》，这是对想要帮助我们组织实现目标的幸存者来说不可或缺的生存指导。我们的组织关键目标是为人类的总体生存带来希望、安全和能确保生存及繁衍文明的可能性。我们集中力量致力于人类的生存，并希望通过幸存者的协助达成这一目标。

original: You have managed to enter `OUR` base of operations - the Militarized Island guarded by very well-trained biologically enhanced soldiers armed to teeth. Plenty of them are heavily mutated having inhumane strength and agility. That Castle - that was a mere cult controlled by an archaic madman - I would have got rid of them myself upon starting our conquest, but you've done me a good favor, the first time - the last time, survivor...
translation: 你成功潜入了我们的行动基地——一座军事化岛屿，这里的守卫都是经过生物增强、全副武装且训练有素的士兵。他们中的许多人因重度变异而拥有非人的力量与敏捷。那座城堡——本是由一个古老的疯子控制的教派所占据——在我们开始征服时，我本打算亲自清除他们，但你第一次也是最后一次为我做了件好事，幸存者...

original: You have managed to enter `OUR` base where we conduct our activities - the Militarized Island guarded by very well-trained biologically enhanced soldiers armed to teeth. Plenty of them are heavily mutated having inhumane strength and agility. That Castle - that was a mere cult controlled by an archaic madman - I would have gotten rid of them myself upon starting our conquest, but you've done me a good favor, your reward will be a bullet to your head by one of my soldiers, survivor...
translation: You have managed to enter `OUR` base where we conduct our activities - the Militarized Island guarded by very well-trained biologically enhanced soldiers armed to teeth. Plenty of them are heavily mutated having inhumane strength and agility. That Castle - that was a mere cult controlled by an archaic madman - I would have gotten rid of them myself upon starting our conquest, but you've done me a good favor, your reward will be a bullet to your head by one of my soldiers, survivor...

original: You have witnessed our work of art - incredibly fast regenerating humanoids. You have also seen pinnacle of our work, provided to us by 'True Superiors' organization, our allies. With enough time, we can make truly immortal humans, extend humans' limits, you cannot even conceive of what power you may achieve! Think of this - how about you stop while you still can? Turn your back on this wanna-be-heroic bunch of fools and become a part of my personal army. I give you an offer. We can establish The New Order together, huh?
translation: 你已经见识了我们的艺术杰作——那些拥有不可思议快速再生能力的人形生物。你也目睹了我们工作的巅峰之作，这得益于与我们同盟的“真正优越者”组织所提供的资源。假以时日，我们能让人类达到真正的不朽，突破你们所能想象的极限，你无法设想自己将拥有的力量！想象一下——何不在一切尚可挽回之时收手？背弃这群自诩英雄的愚人，成为我的私人军队中的一员。我向你提出一个提议，我们可以共同建立新秩序，如何？

original:
You're probably wondering who I am - I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed pre-Cataclysm.I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization, they had predicted the Cataclysm long before it occurred.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been  training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence and survival of our organization and my people...
